name: Timothy J. HAYES, M.D., Respondent, v. MERCY HEALTH CORPORATION, t/a Mercy Catholic Medical Center a/k/a Fitzgerald Mercy Hospital, Petitioner

parties: Timothy J. HAYES, M.D., Respondent, v. MERCY HEALTH CORPORATION, t/a Mercy Catholic Medical Center a/k/a Fitzgerald Mercy Hospital, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 12th day of January 1999, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED, limited to the issue of whether the confidentiality provisions of the Peer Review Act apply to an action by a physician challenging his own peer review process.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
723 A.2d 162
Timothy J. HAYES, M.D., Respondent, v. MERCY HEALTH CORPORATION, t/a Mercy Catholic Medical Center a/k/a Fitzgerald Mercy Hospital, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 12, 1999.
